A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From start to finish Star Wars The Last Jedi had me on the edge of my seat! I was blown away by the emotional impact this movie had on me. I enjoyed the twists and turns. I highly recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys amazing cinema and story telling. I won't say more so that I don't spoil anything for others. Just know that your emotions may need time to recover. Wow! ??????????????
